author: Simon Difford
description: There's no toffee in this "Toffee Negroni" in the same way there's no coffee in the "Coffee Cocktail" yet both drinks are aptly named and delicious.
name: Toffee Negroni
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
